title: Everything you need to know about jungling for season 7
body:
This is a comprehensive jungle guide covering everything you need to know for season 7. Whether you're a beginner or expert I'm confident there will be something here for everyone.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bj5gQ1ReMsg


Most of the topics covered below include examples of in game footage and explanations.


Beginner level junglers if you're just starting out with no runes, no masteries or simply no experience in the jungle.

Itemization guide covering the different situations ~ durability, survival, split pushing, mobility, on hit

Essential masteries for jungle sustain, burst damage, damage over time damage, heavy crowd control tanks and auto attack based champions

The best runes to use for jungling including niche rune combinations 

The significant changes to the s7 jungle (both sides of the jungle are not even)

The most common jungling paths you're probably using right now and you can expect to run into.

The most common counter jungling paths you will encounter.

The one jungle path that is immune to counter jungling.

The uses of the different jungle plants.


I'm aware a 14 minute video might be a bit long for some folks so I've put a recap in at 13:06 you can skip to if you just want a quick summary. 

If you like the video, do leave some feedback, subscribe to the channel to find more content like this and share with your friends!
